events.message: I placed an order over two weeks ago and the shipment still hasn't arrived. The tracking information hasn't been updated for days, and I am very worried about the delay.
System flagged the case as related to delivery delay based on keywords such as 'shipment' and 'tracking' mentioned in the customer's message.
Customer support agent John has been assigned to handle the delivery delay issue reported by the customer.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I understand how frustrating it can be when a delivery is delayed, and I am here to help you with this.
Could you please provide your order number and any tracking details you have? This will help me investigate the delay more effectively.
Sure, my order number is 987654321, and the last tracking update was on June 1st showing the package still at the sorting center.

I checked with the courier service, and there has been a delay due to an unexpected backlog. We expect your package to be delivered within the next 3-5 business days. We apologize for the inconvenience.
Thank you for the update; it's disappointing to hear about more delays, but I appreciate you checking. Please keep me informed if anything changes.
Due to ongoing delay, the case has been escalated to the senior logistics support team for further acceleration of the shipment process.
We have confirmed that your package was delivered today. Please check your location and confirm receipt of your order.
Just following up to ensure you received your order and everything is in good condition. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
The delivery delay case has been closed as the package was received and no further issues were reported by the customer.
